cz.ive.gui
Interface GraphicTemplate

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Template
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimatedTemplate, StaticTemplate
public interface GraphicTemplate
extends java.io.Serializable, Template

This iface represents graphical template common to all equaly visualised objects. This is the right place where to store images, animations and other data with high memory footprint.

Author:
Ondra

load
 

Method Detail

draw

void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D canvas,
          java.awt.Point position,
          int frame)
Draws object at specified position on the given canvas.

Parameters:
canvas - graphical canvas where to draw the object
position - center of the object
frame - number of the animation frame

getBoundingBox

java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingBox(java.awt.Point position,
                                  int frame)
Retrieves bounding box of this object in given Viewpoint. This bounding box is unafected by scale changes in viewpoint.

Parameters:
position - center of the object
frame - frame of the animation
Returns:
rectangular bounding box of this object with given center and animation frame
